HeadComp.title: Textlocal Shutdown: Switch to MSG91 Easily Before October 31, 2025
HeadComp.description: Textlocal Messenger is shutting down by October 31, 2025, with recharges ending from May 1. Move to MSG91 in just one meeting and ensure uninterrupted messaging with powerful features and reliable delivery.

why_msg91.title: One-Meeting Migration

why_msg91.title: 50% Extra Credits
why_msg91.description: You will get 50% extra credits on your first purchase, and you can get up to Rs. 7500 credits for free. Validity of credits will be lifetime.

why_msg91.title: True SMS Delivery
why_msg91.description: Efficient SMS delivery with smart retry logic via alternate operators.

why_msg91.title: No-Charge Resend OTP API
why_msg91.description: Resend OTPs without being charged again through our Resend OTP API.

why_msg91.title: Multi-Channel OTP
why_msg91.description: Don‚Äôt just limit sending OTPs to SMS, also send it via Email, WhatsApp, and Voice using MSG91.

why_msg91.title: Efficient and Reliable OTP Widget
why_msg91.description: It includes a customizable pre-built UI, multi-channel OTP delivery, reCAPTCHA support, and a token system to prevent bot attacks ‚Äî all at no extra cost..

why_msg91.title: Human Support That Cares
why_msg91.description: Real support, not just ticketing systems. Our dedicated technical support team and DLT experts are always available to assist you.

how_to_migrate.title: Schedule a meeting now
how_to_migrate.description: Schedule a 30-minute onboarding call with our team.

how_to_migrate.title: DLT Setup Assistance
how_to_migrate.description: We will port your templates, headers from Textlocal. Our DLT experts will also assist you with CTA Whitelisting and PE-TM chain binding on the DLT portal.

how_to_migrate.title: API Integration Help
how_to_migrate.description: Our experts guide your tech team to integrate MSG91 APIs smoothly.

how_to_migrate.title: Testing & Go Live
how_to_migrate.description: Once you‚Äôre ready, start sending SMS without downtime.

beyond_sms.description: MSG91‚Äôs WhatsApp service offers fast, reliable messaging with budget-friendly plans. MSG91 charges the same per-message rate as Meta.

faqs.question: How can MSG91 benefit my business?
faqs.answer: MSG91 offers numerous benefits for businesses, including improved customer engagement, streamlined communication workflows, increased operational efficiency, and enhanced brand reputation. Our platform enables businesses to automate communication, personalize interactions, and reach their target audience through their preferred channels.

faqs.question: What makes MSG91 different from other communication platforms?
faqs.answer: MSG91 stands out due to its reliability, scalability, and versatility. We specialize in providing mobile cloud communication platforms in India , addressing the unique needs of businesses in this market. Our platform offers advanced features, customizable solutions, and exceptional customer support to help businesses achieve their communication goals.

faqs.question: Is MSG91 suitable for businesses of all sizes?
faqs.answer: Yes, MSG91 caters to businesses of all sizes. Whether you're a startup, small business, or large enterprise, our platform can be tailored to meet your specific requirements. We offer scalable solutions that can accommodate the communication needs of businesses as they grow and expand.

faqs.question: Is MSG91 secure?
faqs.answer: Security is a top priority at MSG91 hello We implement industry-standard protocols and encryption techniques to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your data. Our enterprise cloud communications platform offers features like two-factor authentication and OTP verification to enhance security and protect sensitive information.

faqs.question: Can I integrate MSG91 with my existing systems or applications?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! MSG91 provides developer-friendly APIs and documentation, making it easy to integrate our platform with your existing systems or applications. Our APIs allow you to incorporate our communication functionalities seamlessly, enabling you to automate communication and streamline your workflows.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
